mapper.select: select v.hpSeq, v.hpname, v.dept, v.address, v.phone, v.info, v.latitude, v.longitude ,nvl(sche.open, -1), nvl(sche.close, -1) from (select hpSeq, hpname, dept, address, phone, info, latitude, longitude from hospitalInfo where hpSeq = #{hpSeq}) v left join schedule sche on v.hpSeq = sche.hpSeq
